lead_paragraph: As part of Europe captain Darren Clarke's emphasis on 'shoulder to shoulder' unity at this week's Ryder Cup, he has asked former Ireland rugby union great Paul O'Connell to address his team on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Clarke Turns to Rugby Union Great for Cup Motivation
headline.main: Clarke Turns to Rugby Union Great for Cup Motivation

snippet: As part of Europe captain Darren Clarke's emphasis on 'shoulder to shoulder' unity at this week's Ryder Cup, he has asked former Ireland rugby union great Paul O'Connell to address his team on Tuesday....
